page.title: 12HEALTH
page.content: In our area of Dunfermline there are many facilities provided to do with health. As a result of the increased interest in health over the past years, many groups such as yoga, keep-fit and karate clubs have been introduced. Many of these clubs have their sessions in the Carnegie Centre which offers many sports and leisure facilities to the citizens of the town. There are also many sports clubs for physically and mentally handicapped children and adults. These include riding, swimming and ball sports. The citizens of Dunfermline are lucky enough to have the Carnegie Clinic which offers many services from psychology to chiropody. There are four doctors' practices in our area and nine dentists' surgeries.
